meanings.sent1: The old wooden table was sawdusty from years of use.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter's workshop had a sawdusty smell.
meanings.sent3: The sawdusty floor made the dog sneeze comically.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a sawdusty quality, rough and textured.
meanings.sent5: The sawdusty texture of the cake made it unique and memorable.

meanings.sent1: The sawdusty box held all the tools neatly.
meanings.sent2: The air in the forest was sawdusty after the tree cutting.
meanings.sent3: The sawdusty scent reminded him of his grandfather's workshop.
meanings.sent4: Her perfume had a sawdusty note, earthy and comforting.
meanings.sent5: The sawdusty aroma of the bakery drew customers in from the street.
